pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:5.1: 7. The second training rule on exchanging what belongs to the Order
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:6.2: At that time, after collecting voluntary contributions with the aim of supplying robes for the Order of nuns, the lay followers stored the requisites in the house of a cloth merchant. They then went to the nuns and said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:6.3: “Venerables, requisites to be used for robes are stored in the house of such-and-such a cloth merchant. Please have someone get cloth from that and then share it out.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:6.4: But after asking for them, the nuns exchanged those requisites for tonics, which they then used.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:7.1: When the lay followers found out about this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:7.2: “When requisites belonging to the Order are designated for a specific purpose and were asked for, how can the nuns exchange them for something else?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:7.3: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:7.6: When requisites belonging to the Order are designated for a specific purpose and were asked for, how can the nuns exchange them for something else?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:7.7: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:7.8: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:8.1: ‘When requisites belonging to the Order are designated for a specific purpose and were asked for, if a nun exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:10.1: That was designated for a specific purpose:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:10.2: it was given for a specific purpose.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:11.2: belonging to the Order, not to a group, not to an individual nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:12.2: that she had asked for herself.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:13.2: if, apart from the purpose for which it was given, she gets something else in exchange, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:13.3: When she obtains it, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:13.4: It is to be relinquished to the Order of nuns, a group, or an individual nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:13.5: To be expanded as in Nuns’ Relinquishment 1, {MS.2.2431-2.2435}, with appropriate substitutions.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:13.6: ‘Venerables, this thing which I got in exchange for an article belonging to the Order that was designated for another purpose and that had been asked for is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Order.’ …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:14.1: If it is for a specific purpose and she perceives that it is for a specific purpose, and she gets something else in exchange for it, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:14.2: If it is for a specific purpose, but she is unsure if it is, and she gets something else in exchange for it, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:14.3: If it is for a specific purpose, but she does not perceive that it is for a specific purpose, and she gets something else in exchange for it, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:14.4: When she receives in return what had been relinquished, it is to be used in accordance with the intention of the donors.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:15.1: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she perceives that it is for a specific purpose, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:15.2: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:15.3: If it is not for a specific purpose, and she does not perceive that it is for a specific purpose, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:16.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np7:17.1: The seventh training rule is finished.
